tool_description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application
name: Shazam Core
title: Shazam Core

api_list.name: search
api_list.description: Search for songs, artists that match input term

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number of result you want to get
